maqras.text: silje-ui nal-i issnani
silje-ui nal-i mueos-inyo
silje-ui nal-i mueos-inji mueos-igeudaeege galeuchyeo juliyo
samudeuwa adeu baegseong-eun buhwal-uinal-eul bujeonghaessnola
geulihayeo samudeu baegseong-eun mu seoun cheondung-gwa beongaeui byeolag-eulo myeol manghaess-eumyeo
adeu baegseong-eun chubgo seongnan pogpung e uihae myeolmangdoeeossnola
hananim-eun ilgobbang-gwa pal-ilgan geudeul-ege yeonsogjeog-in jingbeol-eul jueossnanigeudaeneun i baegseongdeul-i buboghan geos-eul boass-eumae ineun sseuleo neom-eojin jonglyeo namu gat-assdeola
geudaeneun geudeul jung sal-a nam-eun eoneu nuguleul bol su iss-eossdeonyo
palaodo geuligo geu ijeon-ui jadeulgwa myeolmangdoen dosideuldo gyesogha yeo joeag-eul jeojilleossnola
junim-i bonaen seonjijaleul geoyeog hayeossgie geubun-eun geudeul-ege hogdoghan beol-eul naelyeossnola
mul-i neomchyeoss-eul ttae hananim-eun neohuileul bangjue taewo bonaessnola
ilo hayeo neohuiege gyohun-i doego gwileul gajinjaneun geugeos-eul gieog hayeo geu gyohun-eul gieoghadolog hayeoss nola
napal soliga hanbeon ullyeo peojilttae
daejiui sandeul-i umjig-igo geu geosdeul-i hanbeon-e sansanjogag-i namyeo
geuttaee keodalan sageon-i il-eo nanila
geunal haneul-i gallajigo him-eul ilhge doenola
cheonsadeul-i jubyeon-e juljieo iss eumyeo geudeul wilo yeoteon cheonsaga geu nal junim-ui gwonjwaleul baddeulgo issnola
geunal-eneun neohuiga simpan-eul bad eun nallo neohuiui eotteon haeng-wido sumgyeo jil su eobsnola
geuui upyeon-e gilog-eul bad-eun janeun yeogie gilog-i issnani ilg-eo ju soseo lago malhamyeo
sillo jeoneun jeoui gyesan-i eoneu nal jeoege ileulilaneun geos-eul al-ass seubnida lago hadeola
geulihayeo geuneun chugbogbad-eun salm eul yeong-wihamyeo
nop-eun cheongug-e issnola
song-isong-i dallin gwail-i son ga kkaie iss-eumyeo
gikkeoi meoggo masila igeos-eun neohuiga jinagan gigan jung-e haenghan seonhaeng-e daehan bosang-ila
geuleona geuui jwapyeon-e gilog-eul bad-eun janeun naui gilog-i na-ege i leuji ani haess-eumyeon hago malhadeola
naega jeojileul haeng-wie daehan beol i mueos-inji mollassnaida
jug-eum-i naui jongmal-ieoss-eumyeon
naui jaesando amuleon sseulmoga eobs-eumyeo
naega gajyeossdeon gwonsedo naegeseo salajyeo beolyeossguna
geuleul pohoeghayeo gusoghalaneun eomhan myeonglyeong-gwa deobul-eo
taoleuneun bulsog-e geuleul naedeon jinhu
chilsib cheog gil-iui soesaseul-e mukk-eo geodge hala
sillo geuneun widaehan hananim-eul midjido anihago
gananhan salamdeul-ege jaseondo bepulji ani haessnola
inal igos-eseo geuegeneun chin gudo eobs-eumyeo
geuga meog-eul eumsig-ilan pigoleum seokk-in geos-eulo
joeindeulman-i meogneun geosdeul-ila
neohuiga boneun geos-eulo maengseha myeo
ttohan neohuiga boji moshaneun geos eulo maengsehasa
sillo igeos-eun hullyunghan seonjija e uihae jeonhayeojin malsseum-eulo
han siin-ui mal-i anila neohui jung-e midneun jaga sosula
igeos-eun jeomjang-iui maldo anigeo neul neohui jung-e suggohaneun ja sosula
igeos-eun man-yuui junim-eulo bu teo naelyeojin gyesilo
man-il geuga hananimkke geoyeogha yeo ilbuui malsseum-eul wijohayeossdamyeon
hananim-eun geuui oleunson-eul but jab-a
geuui dongmaeg-eul jeoldan haess-eulila
ittae neohui jung eoneu nugudo hananim-eul jejihal su eobs-eulila
sillo igeos-eun hananim-eul dulyeo wo haneun jadeul-eul wihan gyohun-ila
hananim-eun neohuijung-eseo geugeos-eulgeoyeoghaneun jadeul-eul algo gyesinila
sillo geugeos-eun bulsinjadeul-ege keun seulpeum-ila
sillo geugeos-eun bunmyeonghan jinlila
geuleomeulo widaehan geudae junim eul chan-yanghala
han jilmunjaga iss-eul eungbeol-e gwanhayeo jilmunhayeossnani
geugeos-eun amudo jejihal su eobs neun bulsinjadeul-eul wihan eungbeol-e gwanhan geos-eulo
seungcheon-ui gil ui junim hananim-eu lobuteoui eungbeol-ila
omannyeongwado gat-eun halu dong-an-echeonsadeulgwa gabeuliel cheonsaga geubun kkelo eullaganila
geuleomeulo geudaeneun aleumdabge innaehala
sillo geudeul-eun geugeos-i meolli iss da saeng-gaghago issnola
geuleona hananim-eun geugeos-i gakka i iss-eum-eul algo gyesinila
geunal-eneun haneul-i yonghaedoen guli cheoleom doel geos-imyeo
sandeul-i yangteolcheoleom doel geos-imyeo
chinguga chinguui anbuleul mul-eul su eobs-eumyeo
bilog geudeul-i seologa seololeul andahayeodo geuleohal geos-imyeo joein deul-eun geunal-ui eungbeol-eul pihagi wiha yeo geuui jason-ina
geuui anaewa hyeongjena
geuleul bohohan chincheog-ina
daejie issneun modeun geos-eul bachyeogeu eungbeol-eul pihalyeo hadoda
geuleona gyeolko geuleohge doel su eobs-eumyeo buljiog-i iss-eul ppun-eulo
meolibuteo bultaewojigo
oemyeonhago geoyeoghaessdeon jadeul-eul buleumyeo
jaemul-eul chugjeoghayeo gamchueossdeon jadeul-eul buleunila
